activities: We provide IT management software for public and private cloud infrastructures. We have very limited personal information including only user names, email, titles and phone number. We have no access to other information within their cloud environments. This information is treated explicitly as confidential information under our Terms of Use agreed to by the end user and not shared with any third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: End User name, email, organization name, title, cookies, Web beacons, Pixel Tags to collect certain usage information
privacyprograms: a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: the EU and/or Swiss data protection authorities
